mapper.select: SELECT SONG_ID, SONG_TILE, SONG_FILE_PATH, SONG_WLYR, SONG_COMPS, SONG_SGER, SONG_LIKE, SONG_VIEW_CNT, SONG_GNRE, SONG_IMG_PATH, SONG_SBTLE, SONG_LTH, SONG_YEAR, SONG_BIT_TRON_RATE FROM plura.tb_song_dtl;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_song_dtl ( SONG_ID, SONG_TILE, SONG_FILE_PATH, SONG_WLYR, SONG_COMPS, SONG_SGER, SONG_LIKE, SONG_VIEW_CNT, SONG_GNRE, SONG_IMG_PATH, SONG_SBTLE, SONG_LTH, SONG_YEAR, SONG_BIT_TRON_RATE ) VALUES ( #{SONG_ID}, #{SONG_TILE}, #{SONG_FILE_PATH}, #{SONG_WLYR}, #{SONG_COMPS}, #{SONG_SGER}, #{SONG_LIKE}, #{SONG_VIEW_CNT}, #{SONG_GNRE}, #{SONG_IMG_PATH}, #{SONG_SBTLE}, #{SONG_LTH}, #{SONG_YEAR}, #{SONG_BIT_TRON_RATE} );
